ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 4 Channel H.264 DVR (no hard drive included); 4). Cmos 420 TV Lines Waterproof Cameras ; 4). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 1) Power Adapter Unit
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
A remote control and mouse are included for easy setup and operation. (hard drive for recording is not included.)
Pre-made Video Power Combined Cables makes installing easy.
1/3'' Cmos Cameras provides 420 TV Lines good resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: Home Security Video Monitoring System 4 Channel H.264 Network Surveillance DVR + 4 x Day Night Waterproof Cameras 60ft Siamese Cables Package (no HDD included)
